channel.title: Can I be able to make a Webclient or a Highscore on Smfforfree3?
channel.description: Can I be able to make a Webclient or a Highscore on Smfforfree3 ? If no, what is cool to make in a Smfforfree3 forum for RSPS ?

item.title: Can I be able to make a Webclient or a Highscore on Smfforfree3?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

just upload then go to.
www.yoursite.com/install
and it will install it then delete the install folder from ftp.

Read full topic

item.title: Can I be able to make a Webclient or a Highscore on Smfforfree3?
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

The reaper is 100% right, phpBB is an awsome free forum exactly like vBulletin, but much more easier to understand, and yes i’ve made a webclient/highscores once apon a time with phpBB.

Read full topic
item.source: Can I be able to make a Webclient or a Highscore on Smfforfree3?

item.title: Can I be able to make a Webclient or a Highscore on Smfforfree3?
item.dc:creator: @Maximum_ZxZ Maximum ZxZ
item.description:
@Maximum_ZxZ wrote:

[quote=“The Reaper X, post:6, topic:308660”][quote author=Maximum ZxZ link=topic=405132.msg2995787#msg2995787 date=1255571714]

[quote author=The Reaper X link=topic=405132.msg2995782#msg2995782 date=1255571173]

I will take the time to help you create a legitimate forum because of how much I hate smfforfree.

Well I would like something like vBulletin but it cost to much money.
[/quote]Use phpBB. It’s incredibly dynamic and looks very nice. It’s probably the next best thing to vBulletin. The only thing to worry about is the complexity, although I’m sure vBulletin is just as difficult backend as phpBB.

So you know how to set up your own free/premium domain and how to set up your forum via an FTP Client or online transfer?

Ok, I’ll try phpBB. But the problem is that I don’t know how to do the thing with FTP Client. Could you give me a tutorial for it please or just help me ?

Thanks.
[/quote]Of course. Perhaps I’ll check if I can make a tutorial post; although it’s not completely RSPS related, it could help a lot. I’ll PM you for now.[/quote]

Ok, thanks.

Read full topic
item.source: Can I be able to make a Webclient or a Highscore on Smfforfree3?

item.title: Can I be able to make a Webclient or a Highscore on Smfforfree3?

@The_Reaper_X wrote:

I will take the time to help you create a legitimate forum because of how much I hate smfforfree.

Well I would like something like vBulletin but it cost to much money.
[/quote]Use phpBB. It’s incredibly dynamic and looks very nice. It’s probably the next best thing to vBulletin. The only thing to worry about is the complexity, although I’m sure vBulletin is just as difficult backend as phpBB.

So you know how to set up your own free/premium domain and how to set up your forum via an FTP Client or online transfer?

Ok, I’ll try phpBB. But the problem is that I don’t know how to do the thing with FTP Client. Could you give me a tutorial for it please or just help me ?

Thanks.[/quote]Of course. Perhaps I’ll check if I can make a tutorial post; although it’s not completely RSPS related, it could help a lot. I’ll PM you for now.
